A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My sincere condolences to everyone who hated it. 

I am a long-time fan and I LOVED the film. It was great to see something new and not just a reboot of IV (yes I'm talking to you JJ). 

The thousands of fan theories during the past 2 years had a negative impact on many people's experience of the EVIII. I don't think any other entry has devided the SW community as much as EVIII and I guess for the majority of us it will be either a hit or a miss. 

May the force be with us.
